1001.Description: Various weapon attacks using the attack key

1002.Description: Basic attack form of the weapon

1003.Description: Heavy attack generated by holding the attack key

1004.Description: Plunge attack performed by executing a normal attack at a certain height above the ground

1005.Description: The most core and well-known signature skill move of the weapon

1006.Description: The most commonly used skill moves of the weapon

1007.Description: The most powerful ultimate combat secret of the weapon

1009.Description: Skill that can be used when being hit and airborne

1010.Description: Powerful skill styles learned through talent

1012.Description: Damage generated by the skill move itself

1013.Description: Additional damage caused by skill-triggered elemental traits

1015.Description: Instantly restores a large amount of HP

1016.Description: Continuously restores HP over a period of time

1017.Description: An effect that can be beneficial to allies in combat

1018.Description: An effect that enhances combat ability, movement ability, or other abilities for a period of time

1019.Description: An effect that significantly boosts combat ability for a short period of time

1020.Description: Combat attributes are greatly enhanced, and if developed under talents, additional effects will be added

1021.Description: In various states that are disadvantageous to one's own combat

1022.Description: A detrimental effect that reduces combat attributes for a period of time

1023.Description: A detrimental effect that increases damage taken for a period of time

1024.Description: Increases damage taken for a period of time, with additional effects if developed under certain talents

1025.Description: In a state where various actions are restricted

1026.Description: In a state where movement and any combat actions are impossible

1027.Description: In a state where movement is impossible

1028.Description: The affected entity is placed under a disabling state in which movement, combat actions, and item usage are entirely restricted. Rapidly applying this effect within a short duration will reduce its total duration. Does not affect bosses.

1029.Description: In a state of reduced Speed

1030.Description: Ability to break the <style="ItemQuality_5">Super Armor</style> bar of powerful targets.

1031.Description: Skills that help characters move quickly

1034.Description: Skills that can help the character survive

1035.Description: Extra HP <style="ItemQuality_5">shield</style>, which can absorb damage before HP.

1036.Description: A special phase of a skill where damage taken is partially mitigated

1038.Description: Damage with the power of Fire

1039.Description: A debuff state where Fire damage is taken at intervals over a period of time

1041.Description: Damage with the power of Ice

1043.Description: Damage with the power of Thunder Element

1045.Description: Damage with the power of Wind

1047.Description: Damage with the power of Rock

1049.Description: Damage with the power of Forest

1051.Description: Damage with the power of Light

1053.Description: Damage with the power of Dark

1054.Description: Auxiliary effects that can generate additional attack actions or resist offensive actions

1055.Description: Effects that synchronize attack actions with the battle

1056.Description: Effects that independently perform attacks to assist in combat

1057.Description: A skill release method that requires some time to prepare to achieve stronger power

1058.Description: A skill release method that requires maintaining a casting state to continue the effect

1059.Description: Skills in a state of being enhanced or producing changes

1060.Description: Conditions required to release certain skills, which can be replenished over time or through certain mechanisms

1061.Description: A type of effect that can be triggered under specific conditions, with the trigger probability influenced by attributes

1062.Description: A state when one's own HP is higher than the target's HP, providing damage and Defense bonuses, with additional effects if developed under certain talents

1063.Description: A combat unit with a specific summoner, whose state is influenced by the summoner

1064.Description: A summon that produces effects after certain conditions are triggered

1065.Description: A summon that remains stationary for a period of time and produces effects around it

1066.Description: A summon that can move and follow the summoner to assist in combat

1067.Description: A summoned creature with autonomous behavior and awareness

1068.Description: A skill mechanism that can perform physical motion and produce effects upon hitting

1071.Description: Effective method within a specified range

1072.Description: Area effect that can continuously provide beneficial status to oneself or allies

1073.Description: Area effect that can continuously cause damage or adverse status to enemies

1074.Description: Can continuously provide effects to targets within its own range

1076.Description: Boss, Wild Boss, and World Boss

1077.Description: monsters active on the continent, generally with basic combat abilities

1078.Description: Outstanding warriors among monsters, generally possessing highly threatening Expertise

1079.Description: The absolute strong in the group, can be called a king without exaggeration

1080.Description: Powerful monsters found only in special territorial areas on the map

1081.Description: The most powerful monster in dungeon maps

1082.Description: Status where HP is not less than 50% of the HP cap

1083.Description: Status where HP is not more than 30% of the HP cap

1084.Description: Additional skills obtained through scenarios or level gameplay

1085.Description: A continuous status granted by refining the "Radiance" series gear

1087.Description: Damage is non-elemental, not carrying elemental power

1088.Description: Affected by an unknown source of contamination, causing various adverse effects

1089.Description: A continuous status granted by refining the "Radiance" series gear

1090.Description: Has the effect of increasing damage amount

1091.Description: Cannot be knocked back, knocked airborne, or knocked down.

1092.Description: Forcing enemy monsters to attack themselves

1093.Description: Has the effect of reflecting damage

1094.Description: Effects that directly impact a unit's combat ability, such as reduced Speed, lowered attributes, being controlled, etc.

1096.Description: Deals <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">100%</style> ATK and allows your next <style="accent-gn">Overdrive</style> to gain <style="accent-gn">2</style> extra <style="accent-gn">Thunder Sigil</style>.

1097.Description: Greatly accelerates the using of <style="accent-gn">Special Attack</style> for <style="accent-gn">10s</style>. Effect ends after you launch a <style="accent-gn">Special Attack</style>.

1098.Description: A hidden technique from <style="accent-gn">Thundercut</style>. Performs a rapid rising slash, dealing <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">300%</style> ATK (which scales with the Level/Tier of <style="accent-gn">Flurry Slash</style>). Once Attack Speed reaches <style="accent-gn">25%</style>|<style="accent-gn">50%</style>|<style="accent-gn">80%</style>, your attack count +<style="accent-gn">1</style>|<style="accent-gn">2</style>|<style="accent-gn">3</style>.

1099.Description:
Each wave deals Attack Damage equal to 100% ATK.
Starts with 1 wave. Gains 1 extra wave for every 10% Mastery, up to 4 waves.

1100.Description: Luck Effect: Deals <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">80%</style> ATK to the enemy.

1101.Description: Spins continuously for <style="accent-gn">35s</style>, dealing <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">50%</style> ATK every <style="accent-gn">2s</style> (which scales with the Level/Tier of Scythe Wheel).

1102.Description: Cannot be knocked back, knocked airborne, or knocked down.

1103.Description: Deals <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">100%</style> ATK to enemies within <style="accent-gn">3</style> meters.

1104.Description: When using a Skill that consumes <style="accent-gn">Thunder Sigils</style>, each additional <style="accent-gn">Thunder Sigil</style> consumed increases the Skill's DMG by <style="accent-gn">25%</style>.

1105.Description:
Deals massive DMG based on the number of Thunder Sigil consumed over the past 10s.
Each consumed Thunder Sigil deals Attack Damage equal to 100% ATK, up to 1000%.

1106.Description: Can accumulate up to <style="accent-gn">20</style> <style="accent-gn">Charge Seed</style>s. When casting <style="accent-gn">Thundercut</style>, consumes <style="accent-gn">15</style> <style="accent-gn">Charge Seed</style>s to trigger <style="accent-gn">Storm Scythe</style>, dealing <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> to surrounding targets.

1107.Description: Grants the blessed target <style="accent-gn">50</style> bonus <style="accent-gn">Intellect</style>, <style="accent-gn">Strength</style>, <style="accent-gn">Agility</style>, and <style="accent-gn">Endurance</style>.

1108.Description:
When a Healing Expertise Skill or Ultimate restores HP, it consumes 2 Regen Buds and throws a Nourishing Seed, once every 1 second.
When a DMG Expertise Skill or Ultimate deals DMG, it consumes 2 Regen Buds and fires a Wild Seed, once per second.

1109.Description: The Healing Chain bounces between allies, restoring HP equal to <style="accent-gn">40%</style> ATK per bounce. Starts with <style="accent-gn">2</style> bounces.

1110.Description: Spreads outward up to <style="accent-gn">20</style> meters, restoring HP equal to <style="accent-gn">150%</style> ATK to all allies hit.

1111.Description: Grants an ally a <style="accent-gn">Shield</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">150%</style> ATK for <style="accent-gn">5s</style>.

1113.Description: Automatically restores HP equal to <style="accent-gn">60%</style> ATK to allies within <style="accent-gn">3</style> meters.

1114.Description: When within <style="accent-gn">3</style> meters of the <style="accent-gn">Engram Orb</style>, gains <style="accent-gn">1</style> <style="accent-gn">Regen Bud</style>. The <style="accent-gn">Engram Orb</style> lasts up to <style="accent-gn">3s</style>.

1115.Description: When it hits the ground, restores HP equal to <style="accent-gn">40%</style> ATK to all allies.

1116.Description: Explodes upon contact with an enemy, dealing <style="magic">Magic Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">100%</style> ATK.

1117.Description: Deals <style="magic">Magic Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">20%</style> ATK per second to the enemy for <style="accent-gn">10s</style>.

1119.Description: The next <style="accent-gn">Expertise Skill</style> used has its CD -<style="accent-gn">50%</style>.

1120.Description: After the next cast of a <style="accent-gn">Expertise Skill</style>, increases your Healing by <style="accent-gn">20%</style> for <style="accent-gn">10s</style>.

1121.Description: The next <style="accent-gn">Life Bloom</style> grants the target a <style="accent-gn">Shield</style> for <style="accent-gn">8s</style>, absorbing DMG equal to <style="accent-gn">200%</style> ATK. Targets with the <style="accent-gn">Shield</style> take <style="accent-gn">10%</style> less DMG from all sources.

1122.Description:
When taking DMG and your HP percentage is higher than the attacker's, reduces the DMG the attacker deals to you by 10%.
When dealing DMG and your HP percentage is higher than the target's, increases the DMG you deal to them by 10%.

1123.Description: Deals <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">50%</style> ATK to an enemy and grants <style="accent-gn">1</style> <style="accent-gn">Sand Crystal</style>.

1125.Description: Deals <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">100%</style> ATK to enemies within <style="accent-gn">3</style> meters, ignores <style="accent-gn">Block</style>, and generates significant Threat.

1126.Description: When performing a <style="accent-gn">Block</style>, gains a chance to trigger <style="accent-gn">Lucky Block</style> based on Luck percentage.

1127.Description: For the next <style="accent-gn">7s</style>, <style="accent-gn">Shield Bash</style> becomes a two-hit combo and costs no <style="accent-gn">Rage</style> or <style="accent-gn">Sand Crystals</style>, while also granting a <style="accent-gn">Shield</style> to yourself. The effect ends after <style="accent-gn">Shield Bash</style> is used.

1128.Description: Deals <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">300%</style> ATK to enemies within <style="accent-gn">5</style> meters. For the next <style="accent-gn">5s</style>, recover <style="accent-gn">20</style> <style="accent-gn">Rage</style> every <style="accent-gn">1</style> second. This effect cannot stack.

1129.Description: Reduces DMG taken by <style="accent-gn">50%</style> and increases Healing Received by <style="accent-gn">30%</style> for <style="accent-gn">10s</style>.

1130.Description: Restores <style="accent-gn">5%</style> of your max <style="accent-gn">Ice Energy</style> (scales with Mastery and Haste) every second for <style="accent-gn">5s</style>.

1131.Description: Strikes the nearest <style="accent-gn">1</style> enemy, dealing <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">30%</style> ATK.

1132.Description: Moves forcibly into melee range to strike the target.

1134.Description:
An enhanced version of Rageburst that summons giant rocks around you, which then explode to deal Attack Damage equal to 750% ATK (which scales with the Level/Tier of Rage Burst.
Earthsplitter does not consume Sand Crystals.

1135.Description: DMG dealt <style="accent-gn">+20%</style>, Move SPD <style="accent-gn">+10%</style>, and gains <style="accent-gn">Super Armor</style>.

1136.Description: Deals <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">300%</style> ATK to enemies within <style="accent-gn">3</style> meters.

1137.Description: Within the zone, reduces your <style="magic">Magic Damage</style> taken by <style="accent-gn">50%</style>, and <style="accent-gn">50%</style> of the DMG taken by Allies (up to <style="accent-gn">10</style>) is redirected to you.

1138.Description: When <style="accent-gn">Photon Energy</style> is full, using a <style="accent-gn">Special Attack</style> allows you to enter <style="accent-gn">Photon Reforge</style>. In this state, <style="accent-gn">Special Attacks</style> and certain <style="accent-gn">Expertise</style> are enhanced. <style="accent-gn">Photon Reforge</style> gradually depletes, and the state ends when it reaches <style="accent-gn">0</style>.

1139.Description: Deals <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">80%</style> ATK to enemies within <style="accent-gn">5</style> meters. For each additional enemy hit, increases the DMG dealt by <style="accent-gn">30%</style> (up to +<style="accent-gn">120%</style>, which scales with the Level/Tier of <style="accent-gn">Basic Attack</style>).

1140.Description: Deals <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">100%</style> ATK to an enemy and inflicts <style="accent-gn">Bleed</style>.

1141.Description: The effect lasts <style="accent-gn">5s</style>, dealing <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">10%</style> ATK per second. If applied again from the same source before the previous <style="accent-gn">Bleed</style> ends, it deals all remaining DMG of the previous <style="accent-gn">Bleed</style> immediately.

1142.Description: Deals <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">50%</style> ATK to the enemy.

1143.Description: Deals <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">350%</style> ATK to the enemy.

1144.Description: Deals <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">100%</style> ATK to enemies within <style="accent-gn">3</style> meters.

1145.Description: Deals <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">250%</style> ATK to the enemies within range.

1146.Description: Flaps its wings on the spot, enhancing the effectiveness of Haste by <style="accent-gn">30%</style> for <style="accent-gn">10s</style>.

1147.Description: Lets out a fierce howl, increasing Light bonus by <style="accent-gn">50%</style> for <style="accent-gn">10s</style>.

1148.Description: When the stacks of <style="accent-gn">Steel Beak</style> reach <style="accent-gn">5</style> or more, grants a fixed <style="accent-gn">30%</style> chance to trigger an <style="accent-gn">Implosion</style> each time a new stack is gained, dealing <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">60%</style> ATK to the enemies within range. <style="accent-gn">The Steel Beak effect</style> stacks up to <style="accent-gn">20</style> times, and loses <style="accent-gn">1</style> stack <style="accent-gn">per second</style>.

1149.Description: Creates a storm with a <style="accent-gn">5</style>-meter radius, dealing <style="accent-gn">80%</style> ATK as <style="magic">Attack Damage</style> ignoring Armor to targets marked with <style="accent-gn">Steel Beak</style> inside the storm every <style="accent-gn">0</style>.<style="accent-gn">5s</style>. After <style="accent-gn">5s</style>, <style="accent-gn">Celestial Eagle</style> dives to the ground, dealing <style="accent-gn">500%</style> ATK as <style="magic">Attack Damage</style> ignoring Armor.

1150.Description: Deals <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">400%</style> ATK to the enemy.

1151.Description: Deals <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">35%</style> ATK to the enemy (which scales with the Level/Tier of <style="accent-gn">Basic Attack</style>).

1153.Description: Target loses HP equal to <style="accent-gn">25%</style> ATK per second for <style="accent-gn">8s</style>.

1156.Description: Luck Effect: Deals <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">150%</style> ATK.

1157.Description: DMG of <style="accent-gn">Instant Edge</style> <style="accent-gn">+30%</style> for <style="accent-gn">10s</style>. It stacks up to <style="accent-gn">2</style> times and 1 stack is consumed after the use of <style="accent-gn">Instant Edge</style>.

1158.Description: Deals <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">350%</style> ATK to the enemies within range. DMG reduces by <style="accent-gn">20%</style> with each attack, down to 40% of the original Damage. Each Tornado maintains independent.

1159.Description: An enhanced version of <style="accent-gn">Sharp Impact</style>. Leaps into the air, dealing <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">800%</style> ATK in total to the target and surrounding enemies (which scales with the Level/Tier of <style="accent-gn">Sharp Impact</style>)

1160.Description: When Ice Meteor deals DMG, <style="accent-gn">Ice Core</style> fires <style="accent-gn">Ice Arrow</style>, granting 1 <style="accent-gn">Frost Crystal</style>.

1161.Description: Grants extra effects to certain skills.

1162.Description: Deals <style="magic">Magic Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">100%</style> ATK to the target.

1163.Description: Deals <style="magic">Magic Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">100%</style> ATK to enemies within <style="accent-gn">3</style> meters.

1164.Description: Throws a <style="accent-gn">Frost Lance</style> that pierces targets, dealing <style="magic">Magic Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">250%</style> ATK.

1165.Description: Luck Effect: Summon a <style="accent-gn">Frost Comet</style> from the sky, dealing <style="magic">Magic Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">200%</style> ATK to the enemy.

1166.Description: Unleashes a powerful pulse from the Frost Ray, dealing <style="magic">Magic Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">500%</style> ATK to enemies it hits.

1167.Description:
Gains 2 Blade Intent per second. Starts with a Max of 100 Blade Intent.
When Blade Intent reaches 100, greatly accelerates the using of Iaido Slash. Using Iaido Slash consumes 100 Blade Intent.
Blade Intent can also be used as a resource for Thundercut.

1168.Description: Enhances <style="accent-gn">Shield</style> effectiveness by <style="accent-gn">3%</style>. The effect lasts <style="accent-gn">10s</style> and stacks up to <style="accent-gn">10</style> times.

1169.Description: Jumps and deals <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">400%</style> ATK to enemies within range. Always triggers <style="accent-gn">Weakness Strike</style> (which scales with the Level/Tier of <style="accent-gn">Basic Attack</style>).

1170.Description: Grants a chance to <style="accent-gn">block</style> <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> and to reduce it by <style="accent-gn">30%</style>.

1171.Description: Immobilizes the target and increases Ice DMG taken by <style="accent-gn">20%</style> for <style="accent-gn">10s</style>. The effect breaks upon taking DMG. Rapidly applying this effect within a short duration will reduce its total duration. Does not affect bosses.

1172.Description: Infuses the Shield with light, absorbing <style="accent-gn">50%</style> of incoming DMG. The effect can stack absorption and reset duration when the Skill is reused. Max absorption cannot exceed <style="accent-gn">100%</style> of Max HP.

1173.Description: Restores HP equal to <style="accent-gn">20%</style> ATK for allies every <style="accent-gn">0.5s</style> for <style="accent-gn">5s</style>

1174.Description: Deals <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">150%</style> ATK to the enemy.

1175.Description: Each stack increases Max HP by <style="accent-gn">2%</style>, and <style="accent-gn">Lightforged Barrier</style> stacks up to <style="accent-gn">10</style> times. Any incoming DMG consumes <style="accent-gn">1</style> stack. The effect lasts <style="accent-gn">25s</style> or until all stacks are consumed. Duration resets each time a new stack is gained.

1176.Description:
Deals Attack Damageequal to 240% ATK to target, which scales with the Level/Tier of Vanguard Strike.
When Vanguard Hunt deals DMG, restores 2% of Max HP and grants Indomitable Courage.

1177.Description: Deal <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">50%</style> ATK and reduces the target's movement speed by <style="accent-gn">25%</style>.

1180.Description: Fires a string note at a nearby enemy/ally, dealing DMG/healing equal to <style="accent-gn">50%</style> of the Beat Performer's MATK.

1182.Description: Deals <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">50%</style> *stacks of ATK per second for <style="accent-gn">10s</style>.

1185.Description: Applies healing to nearby friendly targets, equal to <style="accent-gn">10%</style> of the Beat Performer's MATK.

1188.Description: Deals <style="accent-gn">80%</style> ATK <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> to enemy targets.

1189.Description: Deals <style="accent-gn">300%</style> ATK <style="magic">Magic Damage</style> to enemy targets around self.

1190.Description: Deals <style="magic">Magic Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">60%</style> ATK to the enemies within range (which scales with the Level/Tier of <style="accent-gn">Basic Attack</style>).

1191.Description: Unleashes a fiery shockwave in a <style="accent-gn">5</style>-meter radius around yourself, dealing <style="magic">Magic Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">100%</style> ATK to enemies hit.

1192.Description: Restores HP equal to <style="accent-gn">35%</style> ATK in total within <style="accent-gn">10s</style>. When a <style="accent-gn">Note</style> is granted again, it immediately triggers the remaining healing of the previous <style="accent-gn">Note</style>.

1193.Description: Each time a damage or healing <style="accent-gn">Expertise Skill</style> is cast, there is a fixed <style="accent-gn">50%</style> chance to trigger <style="accent-gn">Encore Strings</style> once, either dealing DMG to the current target or healing the ally with the lowest HP (Party Members Prioritized).

1194.Description: Moves and channels for 6s, continuously casting Passion Burst forward.

1195.Description: Instantly gains <style="accent-gn">100</style> <style="accent-gn">Energy</style> and resets the CD of all healing <style="accent-gn">Expertise</style> immediately. Increases MATK by <style="accent-gn">30%</style> for <style="accent-gn">10s</style>.

1196.Description: Raises the Shield and charges forward, dealing <style="physical">Attack Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">200%</style> ATK to any enemies hit.

1197.Description: Deals <style="magic">Magic Damage</style> equal to <style="accent-gn">100%</style> ATK to the enemies within range.

1198.Description: After <style="accent-gn">10s</style>, unleashes a burst of Holy <style="accent-gn">Energy</style> around, dealing Attack Damage equal to <style="accent-gn">500%</style> of <style="physical">ATK</style> and restoring <style="accent-gn">15%</style> of Max HP.

1199.Description: The target takes DMG equal to <style="accent-gn">20%</style> ATK every second for the next <style="accent-gn">10s</style>. During this time, each time the target deals DMG to you, there is a fixed <style="accent-gn">10%</style> chance to restore HP equal to <style="accent-gn">0.5%</style> of your Max HP.

3000.Description: Interrupts the target's casting and puts the interrupted skill on CD. Does not affect bosses.

3001.Description: Prevents the enemy from casting spells. Does not affect bosses. This is a debuff.

3002.Description: Prevents the enemy from moving. Does not affect bosses. This is a debuff.

3003.Description: Reduces the enemy's Move SPD by <style="accent-gn">30%</style>.

3004.Description: Reduces the amount of healing the enemy receives. This is a debuff.

3005.Description: Prevents the enemy from taking any actions. Does not affect bosses. This is a status effect.

3006.Description: Prevents the enemy from taking any actions. The effect is removed upon receiving DMG. Does not affect bosses. This is a status effect.

3007.Description: Prevents the enemy from taking any actions. The effect is removed upon receiving DMG. Does not affect bosses. This is a status effect.

3008.Description: Prevents the enemy from taking any actions. The effect is removed upon receiving DMG. Does not affect bosses. This is a status effect.

3009.Description: Forces the enemy to move into melee range of their current target to attack. Does not affect bosses. This is a status effect.

3010.Description: The enemy cowers in place in fear. The effect is removed upon receiving DMG. Does not affect bosses. This is a status effect.

3011.Description: Reduces the enemy's Move SPD. Does not affect bosses. This is a debuff.

3012.Description: Causes the enemy to continuously lose HP. This is a debuff.

3013.Description: Causes the enemy to continuously lose HP. This is a debuff.

3014.Description: Causes the enemy to continuously lose HP. This is a debuff.
